commit.message:
Move deepcell-label desktop into its own project (#235)

* Migrate desktop to deepcell-label-desktop and move browser code into a module.

* Update github actions for new paths.

* fix coverage path.

* Remove Desktop references from README and lint some markdown.

* Give link for Controls section.

* typo

* Update README

* Fix typos

* Add .ebignore

* Add .git and FMD to ebignore

* Remove duplicated segment between dev and common

* Move static files to top level

* Update .ebignore

* Add python-dotenv and FLASK_APP and FLASK_ENV
Allows `flask run` to run app

* Add more untracked files to .gitignore

* Add yarn.lock to .gitignore

* Use AWS credential environment variables as default docker-compose values.

* Clarify README, remove references to browser.

* Update copyright to 2021.

* Update options to map /static/ to deepcell_label/static.

Also include FLASK_APP and FLASK_ENV variables in all production builds.

* Move static files back into deepcell_label

* Add static JS files to .gitignore.

* Use container static files not proxy.

* Revert changes to normalize.css

Co-authored-by: tddough98 <40068392+tddough98@users.noreply.github.com>
